Squizzy::

She turned to LadyHawk.  "As much as I would like not to fight, I can 
not stand by and not try to assist my leader. I am sorry, but I have 
to at least try. Besides, these are tranquilizer darts, not regular 
ammo.  Therefore, the bot who I shoot at will not die."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk transforms to Hawk mode and flies over to Squizzy. "Hold 
on little
> one, sit back and watch the fight you'll learn a lot more that way 
and
> you're less likely to be shot." Lady Hawk saw great potential in 
this bot
> for some odd reason she wanted to keep Squizzy around. She saw 
nothing for
> the Alliance but destruction and knew that there was no way she'd 
let her
> fathers dream be distorted by the likes of them. She had the 
printouts from
> the CR chambers, and her father had the skill to recreate the DNA 
patterns
> he needed. There wasn't a reason to stay other than to watch the 
fight. It
> was the perfect chance to escape, unfortunately Squizzy knew to 
much about
> her experiments to be left behind. She couldn't leave the mongoose 
behind
> while it was still functioning. something had to be done soon and 
she had to
> decide what it was.
